document.full_text: the gray wolf will become the first creature ever taken off the u.s. endangered species list by an act of congress, rather than by scientific review, under legislation sent to the white house on thursday.
document.title: congress votes to lift federal wolf protections
lines_and_colors: the gray wolf will become the first creature ever taken off the u.s. endangered species list by an act of congress, rather than by scientific review, under legislation sent to the white house on thursday.
